home.title: Hi! I am a Full Stack Developer
home.goal: My goal is to join a leading company in the industry where I can apply my experience and knowledge to create exceptional web experiences.

about.title: About me
about.description: Passionate web developer with a love for technology, seeking opportunities to gain experience as a full-stack developer. I have experience with cutting-edge web development tools and possess strong collaboration skills.

petBlog.name: Pet Blog
petBlog.description: A blog of tips for pets, designed to help pet owners provide proper care and meet their individual needs.

galaxyCuriosities.name: Curiosities of the Galaxy
galaxyCuriosities.description: Explore and discover astonishing details about outer space with intriguing and educational phrases.

weatherApp.name: Weather App
weatherApp.description: A useful tool providing accurate and up-to-date information about the weather conditions of any city or country.

eCommerce.name: E-commerce
eCommerce.description: An interactive experience that immerses you in the exciting world of online shopping.

crudUsers.name: CRUD Users
crudUsers.description: A web page with CRUD functionality for users using the React library.

pokedex.name: Pokedex
pokedex.description: An application developed with React allowing users to search and filter Pokémon by name and type.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.contactText: I’m very approachable and would love to speak to you. Feel free to call, send me an email, follow me on social media, or simply complete the enquiry form.
